properties.areaDesc: Mono; Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 29 at 3:35AM PST until March 1 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Reno NV
properties.description:
* CHANGES...No changes.

* WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts 40 to 50 mph
expected.

* WHERE...Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties and Mono County.

* WHEN...From 1 PM Saturday to 1 AM PST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects.
Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may
result. High profile vehicle restrictions and rough air for
flying are likely.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Due to recent dry weather, rapid fire
spread is possible in the lower elevations around the region.
Exercise care if out on public lands and follow any burn
restrictions in place by local fire services.
properties.instruction:
Now is the time to secure loose outdoor items such as patio
furniture and trash cans before winds increase which could blow
these items away.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 1 AM PST SUNDAY
